mapper.select: SELECT * FROM program JOIN display ON program.`work_order` = display.`work_order` AND program.`board_type` = display.`board_type` AND program.`line` = display.`line` WHERE program.`state`=1
SELECT id,work_order,board_type,line FROM program WHERE program.`state`=1 AND program.`line`= #{line,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select distinct work_order from program where line= #{line,jdbcType=INTEGER} and state=1
select board_type from program where work_order= #{workOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and line = #{line,jdbcType=INTEGER} and state=1 order by board_type asc

select operation.operator from program_item_visit inner join operation on (operation.material_no = program_item_visit.material_no and program_item_visit.`program_id` = operation.`program_id` and program_item_visit.`lineseat` = operation.`lineseat`) where operation.line = #{line,jdbcType=INTEGER} and operation.work_order = #{workOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and operation.board_type = #{boardType,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY operation.time DESC LIMIT 1
select id from program where line = #{line,jdbcType=INTEGER} and work_order = #{workOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and board_type = #{boardType,jdbcType=INTEGER} and state = 1
